from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional, List
from datetime import datetime
from decimal import Decimal


class ListingImage(BaseModel):
    url: str
    alt_text: Optional[str] = None
    is_primary: bool = False


class ListingAmenity(BaseModel):
    name: str
    category: str
    icon: Optional[str] = None


class ListingHost(BaseModel):
    id: str
    name: str
    avatar_url: Optional[str] = None
    is_superhost: bool = False
    joined_date: datetime


class ListingLocation(BaseModel):
    address: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    postal_code: str
    latitude: float
    longitude: float


class ListingPricing(BaseModel):
    base_price: Decimal
    currency: str = "USD"
    cleaning_fee: Optional[Decimal] = None
    service_fee: Optional[Decimal] = None
    taxes: Optional[Decimal] = None


class ListingAvailability(BaseModel):
    available: bool
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = None
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = None
    minimum_nights: int = 1
    maximum_nights: int = 365


class Listing(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    description: str
    property_type: str = Field(..., description="apartment, house, villa, etc.")
    room_type: str = Field(..., description="entire_place, private_room, shared_room")
    accommodates: int
    bedrooms: int
    bathrooms: float
    beds: int
    square_feet: Optional[int] = None
    
    location: ListingLocation
    host: ListingHost
    
    images: List[ListingImage]
    amenities: List[ListingAmenity]
    
    pricing: ListingPricing
    availability: ListingAvailability
    
    rating: Optional[float] = None
    review_count: int = 0
    
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime
    
    class Config:
        json_encoders = {
            datetime: lambda v: v.isoformat(),
            Decimal: lambda v: float(v)
        }


class ListingCreate(BaseModel):
    title: str
    description: str
    property_type: str
    room_type: str
    accommodates: int
    bedrooms: int
    bathrooms: float
    beds: int
    square_feet: Optional[int] = None
    
    location_id: str
    host_id: str
    
    base_price: Decimal
    currency: str = "USD"
    
    images: List[str] = []
    amenities: List[str] = []


class ListingUpdate(BaseModel):
    title: Optional[str] = None
    description: Optional[str] = None
    property_type: Optional[str] = None
    room_type: Optional[str] = None
    accommodates: Optional[int] = None
    bedrooms: Optional[int] = None
    bathrooms: Optional[float] = None
    beds: Optional[int] = None
    square_feet: Optional[int] = None
    
    base_price: Optional[Decimal] = None
    currency: Optional[str] = None
    
    images: Optional[List[str]] = None
    amenities: Optional[List[str]] = None


class ListingSearchFilters(BaseModel):
    location: Optional[str] = None
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = None
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = None
    guests: Optional[int] = None
    min_price: Optional[Decimal] = None
    max_price: Optional[Decimal] = None
    property_type: Optional[str] = None
    amenities: Optional[List[str]] = None
    min_rating: Optional[float] = None
    
    limit: int = 20
    offset: int = 0


class ListingSearchResponse(BaseModel):
    listings: List[Listing]
    total: int
    has_more: bool
    filters: ListingSearchFilters

from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional, List
from datetime import datetime


class LocationCoordinates(BaseModel):
    latitude: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90)
    longitude: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180)


class Location(BaseModel):
    id: str
    name: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    country_code: str
    coordinates: LocationCoordinates
    
    # Airbnb-style location data
    display_name: str
    search_suggestion: str
    popular: bool = False
    
    # SEO and search optimization
    slug: str
    description: Optional[str] = None
    image_url: Optional[str] = None
    
    # Statistics
    listing_count: int = 0
    average_price: Optional[float] = None
    average_rating: Optional[float] = None
    
    # Hierarchy
    parent_location_id: Optional[str] = None
    child_locations: List[str] = []
    
    # Metadata
    timezone: str
    currency: str = "USD"
    language: str = "en"
    
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime


class LocationCreate(BaseModel):
    name: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    country_code: str
    latitude: float
    longitude: float
    
    display_name: str
    search_suggestion: str
    popular: bool = False
    
    slug: str
    description: Optional[str] = None
    image_url: Optional[str] = None
    
    parent_location_id: Optional[str] = None
    timezone: str = "UTC"
    currency: str = "USD"
    language: str = "en"


class LocationUpdate(BaseModel):
    name: Optional[str] = None
    display_name: Optional[str] = None
    search_suggestion: Optional[str] = None
    popular: Optional[bool] = None
    description: Optional[str] = None
    image_url: Optional[str] = None


class LocationSearchQuery(BaseModel):
    query: str
    limit: int = 10
    include_countries: bool = True
    include_cities: bool = True
    include_regions: bool = True


class LocationSearchResult(BaseModel):
    id: str
    name: str
    display_name: str
    type: str = Field(..., description="country, city, region, neighborhood")
    country: Optional[str] = None
    city: Optional[str] = None
    search_suggestion: str
    coordinates: LocationCoordinates


class LocationSearchResponse(BaseModel):
    results: List[LocationSearchResult]
    query: str
    total: int
    has_more: bool


class PopularLocationsResponse(BaseModel):
    locations: List[Location]
    total: int

@router.get("/", response_model=ListingSearchResponse)
async def search_listings(
    location: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Location to search in"),
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Check-in date"),
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Check-out date"),
    guests: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, description="Number of guests"),
    min_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum price per night"),
    max_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Maximum price per night"),
    property_type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Property type filter"),
    min_rating: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, le=5, description="Minimum rating"),
    limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of results to return"),
    offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip")
):
    """Search for listings based on various criteria"""
    
    # Start with all listings
    results = mock_listings.copy()
    
    # Apply filters
    if location:
        results = [l for l in results if location.lower() in l.location["city"].lower()]
    
    if guests:
        results = [l for l in results if l.accommodates >= guests]
    
    if min_price:
        results = [l for l in results if float(l.pricing["base_price"]) >= min_price]
    
    if max_price:
        results = [l for l in results if float(l.pricing["base_price"]) <= max_price]
    
    if property_type:
        results = [l for l in results if l.property_type == property_type]
    
    if min_rating:
        results = [l for l in results if l.rating and l.rating >= min_rating]
    
    # Apply pagination
    total = len(results)
    results = results[offset:offset + limit]
    has_more = offset + limit < total
    
    filters = ListingSearchFilters(
        location=location,
        check_in=check_in,
        check_out=check_out,
        guests=guests,
        min_price=Decimal(str(min_price)) if min_price else None,
        max_price=Decimal(str(max_price)) if max_price else None,
        property_type=property_type,
        min_rating=min_rating,
        limit=limit,
        offset=offset
    )
    
    return ListingSearchResponse(
        listings=results,
        total=total,
        has_more=has_more,
        filters=filters
    )


@router.get("/{listing_id}", response_model=Listing)
async def get_listing(listing_id: str):
    """Get a specific listing by ID"""
    listing = next((l for l in mock_listings if l.id == listing_id), None)
    if not listing:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Listing not found")
    return listing


@router.post("/", response_model=Listing)
async def create_listing(listing: ListingCreate):
    """Create a new listing"""
    new_listing = Listing(
        id=f"lst_{uuid.uuid4().hex[:8]}",
        title=listing.title,
        description=listing.description,
        property_type=listing.property_type,
        room_type=listing.room_type,
        accommodates=listing.accommodates,
        bedrooms=listing.bedrooms,
        bathrooms=listing.bathrooms,
        beds=listing.beds,
        square_feet=listing.square_feet,
        location={
            "address": "123 Main St",
            "city": "San Francisco",
            "state": "California",
            "country": "United States",
            "postal_code": "94105",
            "latitude": 37.7749,
            "longitude": -122.4194
        },
        host={
            "id": "host_1",
            "name": "Test Host",
            "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg",
            "is_superhost": False,
            "joined_date": datetime.now()
        },
        images=[{"url": url, "is_primary": i == 0} for i, url in enumerate(listing.images)],
        amenities=[{"name": amenity, "category": "basic"} for amenity in listing.amenities],
        pricing={
            "base_price": listing.base_price,
            "currency": listing.currency
        },
        availability={
            "available": True,
            "minimum_nights": 1,
            "maximum_nights": 30
        },
        rating=None,
        review_count=0,
        created_at=datetime.now(),
        updated_at=datetime.now()
    )
    
    mock_listings.append(new_listing)
    return new_listing


@router.put("/{listing_id}", response_model=Listing)
async def update_listing(listing_id: str, listing_update: ListingUpdate):
    """Update an existing listing"""
    listing = next((l for l in mock_listings if l.id == listing_id), None)
    if not listing:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Listing not found")
    
    # Update fields
    update_data = listing_update.dict(exclude_unset=True)
    for field, value in update_data.items():
        setattr(listing, field, value)
    
    listing.updated_at = datetime.now()
    return listing


@router.delete("/{listing_id}")
async def delete_listing(listing_id: str):
    """Delete a listing"""
    global mock_listings
    listing = next((l for l in mock_listings if l.id == listing_id), None)
    if not listing:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Listing not found")
    
    mock_listings = [l for l in mock_listings if l.id != listing_id]
    return {"message": "Listing deleted successfully"}


@router.get("/featured/popular", response_model=List[Listing])
async def get_popular_listings(limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50)):
    """Get popular listings for the homepage"""
    # Sort by rating and review count
    popular = sorted(
        [l for l in mock_listings if l.rating and l.rating >= 4.5],
        key=lambda x: (x.rating or 0, x.review_count),
        reverse=True
    )
    return popular[:limit]

@router.get("/search", response_model=LocationSearchResponse)
async def search_locations(
    query: str = Query(..., min_length=2, description="Search query"),
    limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Number of results"),
    include_countries: bool = Query(True, description="Include countries in results"),
    include_cities: bool = Query(True, description="Include cities in results"),
    include_regions: bool = Query(True, description="Include regions in results")
):
    """Search for locations based on query string"""
    
    query_lower = query.lower()
    results = []
    
    for location in mock_locations:
        # Simple search - match against name, city, state, country
        search_text = f"{location.name} {location.city} {location.state} {location.country}".lower()
        
        if query_lower in search_text:
            result = LocationSearchResult(
                id=location.id,
                name=location.name,
                display_name=location.display_name,
                type="city",
                country=location.country,
                city=location.city,
                search_suggestion=location.search_suggestion,
                coordinates=location.coordinates
            )
            results.append(result)
    
    # Sort by popularity and relevance
    results = sorted(results, key=lambda x: x.display_name)
    
    # Apply limit
    total = len(results)
    results = results[:limit]
    has_more = total > limit
    
    return LocationSearchResponse(
        results=results,
        query=query,
        total=total,
        has_more=has_more
    )


@router.get("/popular", response_model=PopularLocationsResponse)
async def get_popular_locations(limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50)):
    """Get popular locations for the homepage"""
    popular = [loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.popular]
    popular = sorted(popular, key=lambda x: x.listing_count, reverse=True)
    
    return PopularLocationsResponse(
        locations=popular[:limit],
        total=len(popular)
    )


@router.get("/{location_id}", response_model=Location)
async def get_location(location_id: str):
    """Get a specific location by ID"""
    location = next((loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id == location_id), None)
    if not location:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Location not found")
    return location


@router.post("/", response_model=Location)
async def create_location(location: LocationCreate):
    """Create a new location"""
    new_location = Location(
        id=f"loc_{uuid.uuid4().hex[:8]}",
        name=location.name,
        city=location.city,
        state=location.state,
        country=location.country,
        country_code=location.country_code,
        coordinates={
            "latitude": location.latitude,
            "longitude": location.longitude
        },
        display_name=location.display_name,
        search_suggestion=location.search_suggestion,
        popular=location.popular,
        slug=location.slug,
        description=location.description,
        image_url=location.image_url,
        timezone=location.timezone,
        currency=location.currency,
        language=location.language,
        created_at=datetime.now(),
        updated_at=datetime.now()
    )
    
    mock_locations.append(new_location)
    return new_location


@router.put("/{location_id}", response_model=Location)
async def update_location(location_id: str, location_update: LocationUpdate):
    """Update an existing location"""
    location = next((loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id == location_id), None)
    if not location:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Location not found")
    
    update_data = location_update.dict(exclude_unset=True)
    for field, value in update_data.items():
        setattr(location, field, value)
    
    location.updated_at = datetime.now()
    return location


@router.delete("/{location_id}")
async def delete_location(location_id: str):
    """Delete a location"""
    global mock_locations
    location = next((loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id == location_id), None)
    if not location:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Location not found")
    
    mock_locations = [loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id != location_id]
    return {"message": "Location deleted successfully"}


@router.get("/{location_id}/nearby", response_model=List[Location])
async def get_nearby_locations(
    location_id: str,
    radius_km: float = Query(50.0, ge=1, le=500, description="Search radius in kilometers")
):
    """Get locations near a specific location"""
    location = next((loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id == location_id), None)
    if not location:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Location not found")
    
    # Simple distance calculation (Haversine formula would be better)
    nearby = []
    for loc in mock_locations:
        if loc.id != location_id:
            # Calculate approximate distance (simplified)
            lat_diff = abs(loc.coordinates["latitude"] - location.coordinates["latitude"])
            lng_diff = abs(loc.coordinates["longitude"] - location.coordinates["longitude"])
            distance = (lat_diff ** 2 + lng_diff ** 2) ** 0.5 * 111  # Approx km per degree
            
            if distance <= radius_km:
                nearby.append(loc)
    
    # Sort by distance (approximate)
    nearby = sorted(nearby, key=lambda x: abs(x.coordinates["latitude"] - location.coordinates["latitude"]))
    
    return nearby


@router.get("/autocomplete/{query}", response_model=List[LocationSearchResult])
async def autocomplete_locations(
    query: str,
    limit: int = Query(5, ge=1, le=20)
):
    """Autocomplete endpoint for location search"""
    if len(query) < 2:
        return []
    
    results = []
    query_lower = query.lower()
    
    for location in mock_locations:
        # Match against various combinations
        search_terms = [
            location.name.lower(),
            location.city.lower(),
            f"{location.city}, {location.state}".lower(),
            f"{location.city}, {location.country}".lower()
        ]
        
        for term in search_terms:
            if query_lower in term:
                result = LocationSearchResult(
                    id=location.id,
                    name=location.name,
                    display_name=location.display_name,
                    type="city",
                    country=location.country,
                    city=location.city,
                    search_suggestion=location.search_suggestion,
                    coordinates=location.coordinates
                )
                results.append(result)
                break
    
    # Remove duplicates and limit
    seen = set()
    unique_results = []
    for result in results:
        if result.id not in seen:
            seen.add(result.id)
            unique_results.append(result)
    
    return unique_results[:limit]

import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000/api';

export const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  timeout: 10000,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    // Add auth token if available
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      // Handle unauthorized access
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    
    const errorMessage = error.response?.data?.detail || error.message || 'An error occurred';
    console.error('API Error:', errorMessage);
    
    return Promise.reject({
      message: errorMessage,
      status: error.response?.status,
      data: error.response?.data,
    });
  }
);

export interface ApiError {
  message: string;
  status?: number;
  data?: any;
}

export interface ApiResponse<T> {
  data: T;
  message?: string;
  status: number;
}

export interface PaginatedResponse<T> {
  items: T[];
  total: number;
  has_more: boolean;
  limit: number;
  offset: number;
}

export const handleApiError = (error: any): ApiError => {
  if (error.response) {
    return {
      message: error.response.data?.detail || error.response.data?.message || 'Server error',
      status: error.response.status,
      data: error.response.data,
    };
  } else if (error.request) {
    return {
      message: 'Network error. Please check your connection.',
      status: 0,
    };
  } else {
    return {
      message: error.message || 'An unexpected error occurred',
    };
  }
};

export const buildQueryString = (params: Record<string, any>): string => {
  const query = new URLSearchParams();
  
  Object.entries(params).forEach(([key, value]) => {
    if (value !== undefined && value !== null && value !== '') {
      if (Array.isArray(value)) {
        value.forEach(v => query.append(key, String(v)));
      } else {
        query.append(key, String(value));
      }
    }
  });
  
  return query.toString();
};

export const formatDateForAPI = (date: Date | string): string => {
  if (typeof date === 'string') return date;
  return date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
};

export const formatDateTimeForAPI = (date: Date | string): string => {
  if (typeof date === 'string') return date;
  return date.toISOString();
};

export default api;

import api from './api';
import type {
  Listing,
  ListingCreate,
  ListingUpdate,
  ListingSearchFilters,
  ListingSearchResponse,
  FeaturedListingsResponse,
  SearchQuery,
  SearchFilters,
} from '@/types/listing';

export const listingService = {
  // Search listings with filters
  async searchListings(filters: ListingSearchFilters): Promise<ListingSearchResponse> {
    const queryString = new URLSearchParams();
    
    Object.entries(filters).forEach(([key, value]) => {
      if (value !== undefined && value !== null) {
        if (Array.isArray(value)) {
          value.forEach(v => queryString.append(key, String(v)));
        } else {
          queryString.append(key, String(value));
        }
      }
    });

    const response = await api.get(`/listings?${queryString}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get a single listing by ID
  async getListing(id: string): Promise<Listing> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/${id}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Create a new listing
  async createListing(listing: ListingCreate): Promise<Listing> {
    const response = await api.post('/listings', listing);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Update an existing listing
  async updateListing(id: string, listing: ListingUpdate): Promise<Listing> {
    const response = await api.put(`/listings/${id}`, listing);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Delete a listing
  async deleteListing(id: string): Promise<void> {
    await api.delete(`/listings/${id}`);
  },

  // Get featured/popular listings
  async getFeaturedListings(limit: number = 10): Promise<FeaturedListingsResponse> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/featured/popular?limit=${limit}`);
    return {
      listings: response.data,
      total: response.data.length,
    };
  },

  // Search with simplified query interface
  async searchWithQuery(query: SearchQuery): Promise<ListingSearchResponse> {
    const filters: ListingSearchFilters = {
      location: query.location,
      check_in: query.checkIn,
      check_out: query.checkOut,
      guests: query.guests,
      limit: 20,
      offset: 0,
    };

    return this.searchListings(filters);
  },

  // Advanced search with additional filters
  async advancedSearch(
    query: SearchQuery,
    filters: SearchFilters = {}
  ): Promise<ListingSearchResponse> {
    const searchFilters: ListingSearchFilters = {
      location: query.location,
      check_in: query.checkIn,
      check_out: query.checkOut,
      guests: query.guests,
      min_price: filters.priceRange?.[0],
      max_price: filters.priceRange?.[1],
      property_type: filters.property_type,
      min_rating: filters.min_rating,
      limit: filters.limit || 20,
      offset: filters.offset || 0,
    };

    return this.searchListings(searchFilters);
  },

  // Get listings by host
  async getListingsByHost(hostId: string): Promise<Listing[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings?host_id=${hostId}`);
    return response.data.listings;
  },

  // Get similar listings
  async getSimilarListings(listingId: string, limit: number = 5): Promise<Listing[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/${listingId}/similar?limit=${limit}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get listings by location
  async getListingsByLocation(locationId: string): Promise<Listing[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings?location_id=${locationId}`);
    return response.data.listings;
  },

  // Check availability
  async checkAvailability(
    listingId: string,
    checkIn: string,
    checkOut: string,
    guests: number
  ): Promise<{ available: boolean; price?: number }> {
    const response = await api.get(
      `/listings/${listingId}/availability?check_in=${checkIn}&check_out=${checkOut}&guests=${guests}`
    );
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get price range for location
  async getPriceRange(location: string): Promise<{ min: number; max: number }> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/price-range?location=${location}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get property types for location
  async getPropertyTypes(location: string): Promise<string[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/property-types?location=${location}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get amenities for location
  async getAmenities(location: string): Promise<string[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/listings/amenities?location=${location}`);
    return response.data;
  },
};

// Location service for location-related operations
export const locationService = {
  // Search locations
  async searchLocations(query: string, limit: number = 10): Promise<LocationSearchResponse> {
    const response = await api.get(`/locations/search?query=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&limit=${limit}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get popular locations
  async getPopularLocations(limit: number = 10): Promise<PopularLocationsResponse> {
    const response = await api.get(`/locations/popular?limit=${limit}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get location by ID
  async getLocation(id: string): Promise<Location> {
    const response = await api.get(`/locations/${id}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Autocomplete locations
  async autocompleteLocations(query: string, limit: number = 5): Promise<LocationSearchResult[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/locations/autocomplete/${encodeURIComponent(query)}?limit=${limit}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  // Get nearby locations
  async getNearbyLocations(locationId: string, radiusKm: number = 50): Promise<Location[]> {
    const response = await api.get(`/locations/${locationId}/nearby?radius_km=${radiusKm}`);
    return response.data;
  },
};

// Export combined service
export const searchService = {
  ...listingService,
  ...locationService,
};

export default searchService;

```
@router.get("/", response_model=ListingSearchResponse)
async def search_listings(
    location: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Location to search in"),
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Check-in date"),
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = Query(None, description="Check-out date"),
    guests: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, description="Number of guests"),
    min_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum price per night"),
    max_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Maximum price per night"),
    property_type: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Property type filter"),
    min_rating: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, le=5, description="Minimum rating"),
    limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of results to return"),
    offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip")
):
    """Search for listings based on various criteria"""
    
    # Start with all listings
    results = mock_listings.copy()
    
    # Apply filters
    if location:
        results = [l for l in results if location.lower() in l.location["city"].lower()]
    
    if guests:
        results = [l for l in results if l.accommodates >= guests]
    
    if min_price:
        results = [l for l in results if float(l.pricing["base_price"]) >= min_price]
    
    if max_price:
        results = [l for l in results if float(l.pricing["base_price"]) <= max_price]
    
    if property_type:
        results = [l for l in results if l.property_type == property_type]
    
    if min_rating:
        results = [l for l in results if l.rating and l.rating >= min_rating]
    
    # Apply pagination
    total = len(results)
    results = results[offset:offset + limit]
    has_more = offset + limit < total
    
    filters = ListingSearchFilters(
        location=location,
        check_in=check_in,
        check_out=check_out,
        guests=guests,
        min_price=Decimal(str(min_price)) if min_price else None,
        max_price=Decimal(str(max_price)) if max_price else None,
        property_type=property_type,
        min_rating=min_rating,
        limit=limit,
        offset=offset
    )
    
    return ListingSearchResponse(
        listings=results,
        total=total,
        has_more=has_more,
        filters=filters
    )
```

```
@router.get("/search", response_model=LocationSearchResponse)
async def search_locations(
    query: str = Query(..., min_length=2, description="Search query"),
    limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Number of results"),
    include_countries: bool = Query(True, description="Include countries in results"),
    include_cities: bool = Query(True, description="Include cities in results"),
    include_regions: bool = Query(True, description="Include regions in results")
):
    """Search for locations based on query string"""
    
    query_lower = query.lower()
    results = []
    
    for location in mock_locations:
        # Simple search - match against name, city, state, country
        search_text = f"{location.name} {location.city} {location.state} {location.country}".lower()
        
        if query_lower in search_text:
            result = LocationSearchResult(
                id=location.id,
                name=location.name,
                display_name=location.display_name,
                type="city",
                country=location.country,
                city=location.city,
                search_suggestion=location.search_suggestion,
                coordinates=location.coordinates
            )
            results.append(result)
    
    # Sort by popularity and relevance
    results = sorted(results, key=lambda x: x.display_name)
    
    # Apply limit
    total = len(results)
    results = results[:limit]
    has_more = total > limit
    
    return LocationSearchResponse(
        results=results,
        query=query,
        total=total,
        has_more=has_more
    )

@router.get("/{location_id}/nearby", response_model=List[Location])
async def get_nearby_locations(
    location_id: str,
    radius_km: float = Query(50.0, ge=1, le=500, description="Search radius in kilometers")
):
    """Get locations near a specific location"""
    location = next((loc for loc in mock_locations if loc.id == location_id), None)
    if not location:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Location not found")
    
    # Simple distance calculation (Haversine formula would be better)
    nearby = []
    for loc in mock_locations:
        if loc.id != location_id:
            # Calculate approximate distance (simplified)
            lat_diff = abs(loc.coordinates["latitude"] - location.coordinates["latitude"])
            lng_diff = abs(loc.coordinates["longitude"] - location.coordinates["longitude"])
            distance = (lat_diff ** 2 + lng_diff ** 2) ** 0.5 * 111  # Approx km per degree
            
            if distance <= radius_km:
                nearby.append(loc)
    
    # Sort by distance (approximate)
    nearby = sorted(nearby, key=lambda x: abs(x.coordinates["latitude"] - location.coordinates["latitude"]))
    
    return nearby

            location.city.lower(),
            f"{location.city}, {location.state}".lower(),
            f"{location.city}, {location.country}".lower()
        ]
        
        for term in search_terms:
            if query_lower in term:
                result = LocationSearchResult(
                    id=location.id,
                    name=location.name,
                    display_name=location.display_name,
                    type="city",
                    country=location.country,
                    city=location.city,
                    search_suggestion=location.search_suggestion,
                    coordinates=location.coordinates
                )
                results.append(result)
                break
    
    # Remove duplicates and limit
    seen = set()
    unique_results = []
    for result in results:
        if result.id not in seen:
            seen.add(result.id)
            unique_results.append(result)
    
    return unique_results[:limit]
```
